verses.content: Chuongchun, Israelhai chu Sittima an um lai chun, Moab naunuhmeihai an pâwl tah a;
an pathienhai kuoma an in- thâwinahaia chun an fiel tâwl a; Chuongchun, an fâk a, an pathienhai chu chibai an bûk ve tah a.
Israelhai chun Baal-peor an pawm ve tah a, chuongchun, Israel- hai chunga chun LALPA lung chu a chawk tah a.
Chuongchun, Mosie kuomah, “Mipuihai ṭhuoituhai po po chu ṭhuoi la, LALPA lunginsenna ṭiumtak el chu Israelhai chunga inthawka ân kieng theina dingin sûn varah LALPA hmaah khaihlum rawh,” a ta.
Chun, Mosie chun Israel rorêl- tuhai kuoma chun, “Baal-peor pawm- tuhai po po chu sukhlum vawng ro,” a ta.
Chun, ngai ta, Israel laia mi pakhatin intuokna puon in kawt- khâra a ṭap lai takin Mosie mithmua le Israel mi pungkhâwmhai mit- hmuah Midian nuhmei pakhat a unauhai kuomah a hung ṭhuoi a.
Chun, thiempu Aron naupa Eleazar naupa Phinehas chun a lo hmuh a, pungkhâwmhai laia chun a tho a, fei a lâk a;
Chun, Israel mi chu puon in sûnga chun a hnawt lût a. Israel mi leh an pahni chun a sun thleng a, nuhmei chu a phîngah.
Chuongchun, Israel thlahai chunga hremna chu a re tah a. Chu hremnaa thihai chu sîng hni le sâng li an nih.
LALPA chun Mosie a biek a,

“Thiempu Aron nau Eleazar naupa Phinehas hin ka thîkna anga anni laia a thîkna chun ka lunginsen chu Israel thlahai laia inthawk chun a sukkieng a; chuongchun, ka thîkna chun Israel thlahai chu sukbohmang naw ning.
Chuleiin, ka remna thuthlung chu a chungah thlung ka ta,
ama le a hnunga a thlahai ta dingin kumkhaw thiempu nina thu- thlung nîng a tih; a Pathien ta dingin a thîk a, Israel thlahai ta dinga inremna a siem leiin, ti rawh,” tiin.
Israel mi an that, Midian nuhmei le an ithat hming chu Zimri, Simeon mihai laia an pahnam ṭhuoitu Salu naupa a nih.
Chun, Midian nuhmei an ithat hming chu Kozbi, Zura naunu a nih; ama chu Midian mihai pahnam laia an hotu a nih.
LALPA chun Mosie a biek a, “Midian mihai chu suklungzîng unla, sukbohmang ro.
Anni khawma Peor chungchâng thua le Peor chungchâng thu a hrem nia an farnu, Midian mihai milien naunu an that,
Kozbi chungchâng thua var vervêka an hlêm chêu ang khan an la hlêm ta rawp si chêu leiin,” tiin.
